title: Which two country singers famously sang together on the 1983 song Islands in the Stream? - Quora

response.answer_text: Islands In The Stream was written by The Bee Gees and was sung by Kenny Rogers and Dolly Parton. It was released as the first single from Rogers’ album Eyes That See In The Dark in August 1983. The song was named after Ernest Hemingway’s novel Islands In The Stream. It was originally written for Marvin Gaye in an R&B style but, it was changed later for Kenny Rogers’ album. I’ve heard both The Bee Gees version and the Kenny & Dolly version. Both sound good and I’ve also heard covers of this song.

Islands In The Stream was written by The Bee Gees and was sung by Kenny Rogers and Dolly Parton. It was released as the first single from Rogers’ album Eyes That See In The Dark in August 1983. The song was named after Ernest Hemingway’s novel Islands In The Stream. It was originally written for Marvin Gaye in an R&B style but, it was changed later for Kenny Rogers’ album. Kenny initially hated the song, until his manager brought Parton on board.
